item.peyroscythe.pontifical_knight_medal: Lost Medal of the Pontifical Knight
tooltip.item.peyroscythe.pontifical_knig: Buried with the memories of a life once left behind.
tooltip.item.peyroscythe.wintermoon_hear: An heirloom of the Wintermoon family.
tooltip.item.peyroscythe.captain_greg_do: Capt. Hanson Gregory. Recognized by the National Bakers Association as the inventor of the doughnut.
spell.peyroscythe.crimson_moon.guide: Raise the Crimson Moon, applying Moon Frenzy to all creatures within range: increases attack damage, attack speed, and Blood school spell power, and restores the Crimson Moon's owner's health when dealing damage.
spell.peyroscythe.sinfire_embrace.guide: Ignite yourself with fire, temporarily losing armor but gaining powerful health regeneration. Attacks ignite targets, and killing a creature extends the effect duration — but once the flames are extinguished, the effect ends immediately.
spell.peyroscythe.frost_hell.guide: Smash the ground with your weapon to unleash a frost shockwave in a frontal cone. Damage increases based on the weapon you wield.
spell.peyroscythe.glacier.guide: Summon a massive iceberg above the target’s head and let it crash down. Higher spell levels summon larger icebergs.
spell.peyroscythe.death_smoke.guide: Engulf enemies in death smoke, gradually corroding them. If the corrosion becomes severe enough, the target will perish, restoring your health and mana.
spell.peyroscythe.the_frozen_world.guide: Instantly lowers the surrounding temperature, creating snow and ice. Creatures close to the caster take damage based on their maximum health and are immediately frozen, while an icy fog is generated.
spell.peyroscythe.icy_comet_rain.guide: Call down a shower of icy comets. Stronger levels bring heavier storms. Anything unlucky enough to be pelted too often in a short time will end up frozen solid.
death.attack.peyroscythe.frost_hell: %1$s was blended into a frozen smoothie by %2$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.frost_hell.item: %1$s was blended into a frozen smoothie by %2$s using %3$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.glacier.item: %1$s experienced rapid glacial movement—head-first—thanks to %2$s and their %3$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.death_smoke.ite: %1$s became a piece of snack by %2$s using Death Smoke brought by %3$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.the_frozen_worl: %2$s accidentally turned %1$s into a popsicle... with the freezer set way too low.
%2$s used %3$s to turn %1$s into a popsicle, but set the temperature far too low.
death.attack.peyroscythe.ice_comet_rain: %2$s dropped enough ice on %1$s to make the perfect summer milkshake.
%2$s used %3$s to turn %1$s into a summer milkshake special.
